            get_pr_json() {
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
            

            

              curl -s -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" "https://api.github.com/repos/bats-core/bats-core/pulls/$1"
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6.

    7.

    9.

            #!/usr/bin/env bash

    4. 
            
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            1
            

            

            if command -v greadlink >/dev/null; then
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
            

            

              bats_readlinkf() {
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
            

            

                greadlink -f "$1"
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
            

            

              }
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9.

    10. 
            
            

            

              bats_readlinkf() {
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            1
            

            

                readlink -f "$1"
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
            

            

              }

            fallback_to_readlinkf_posix() {
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
            

            

              bats_readlinkf() {
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

                [ "${1:-}" ] || return 1
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
            

            

                max_symlinks=40
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
            

            

                CDPATH='' # to avoid changing to an unexpected directory
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
            

            

                target=$1
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

                [ -e "${target%/}" ] || target=${1%"${1##*[!/]}"} # trim trailing slashes
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

                [ -d "${target:-/}" ] && target="$target/"
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

                cd -P . 2>/dev/null || return 1
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
            

            

                while [ "$max_symlinks" -ge 0 ] && max_symlinks=$((max_symlinks - 1)); do
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
            

            

                  if [ ! "$target" = "${target%/*}" ]; then
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

                    case $target in
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
            

            

                    /*) cd -P "${target%/*}/" 2>/dev/null || break ;;
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
            

            

                    *) cd -P "./${target%/*}" 2>/dev/null || break ;;
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

                    esac
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
            

            

                    target=${target##*/}
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

                  fi
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

                  if [ ! -L "$target" ]; then
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

                    target="${PWD%/}${target:+/}${target}"
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

                    printf '%s\n' "${target:-/}"
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

                    return 0
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
            

            

                  fi
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

                  # `ls -dl` format: "%s %u %s %s %u %s %s -> %s\n",
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
            

            

                  #   <file mode>, <number of links>, <owner name>, <group name>,
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
            

            

                  #   <size>, <date and time>, <pathname of link>, <contents of link>
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
            

            

                  # https://pubs.opengroup.org/onlinepubs/9699919799/utilities/ls.html
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
            

            

                  link=$(ls -dl -- "$target" 2>/dev/null) || break
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            2
            

            

                  target=${link#*" $target -> "}
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            2
            

            

                done
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            2
            

            

                return 1
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            2
            

            

              }
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            2
            

            

            }
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            2
            

            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            2
            

            

            if ! BATS_PATH=$(bats_readlinkf "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" 2>/dev/null); then
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
            

            

              fallback_to_readlinkf_posix
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
            

            

              BATS_PATH=$(bats_readlinkf "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}")
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
            

            

            fi
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
            

            

            
          
      57.

            2

      58.

            2
            

            

            export BATS_ROOT=${BATS_PATH%/*/*}
          
      59.

            1

            1

            #!/usr/bin/env bash
          
      2.

            #
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            
            

            

            # bats-core git releaser
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
            

            

            #
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
            

            

            ## Usage: %SCRIPT_NAME% [options]
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
            

            

            ##
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
            

            

            ## Options:

    8. 
            
            

            

            ##   --major            Major version bump

    9. 
            
            

            

            ##   --minor            Minor version bump
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
            

            

            ##   --patch            Patch version bump

    11.

            ##   -v, --version      Print version

            ##   --debug            Enable debug mode
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

            ##   -h, --help         Display this message
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

            ##

            DIR=$(cd "$(dirname "${0}")" && pwd)

            THIS_SCRIPT="${DIR}/$(basename "${0}")"

            BATS_VERSION=$(
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

              # shellcheck disable=SC1090
          
      23.

              echo "${BATS_VERSION}"
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

            )
          
      26.

            declare -r DIR

            BUMP_INTERVAL=""
          
      31.

            NEW_BATS_VERSION=""
          
      32.

            main() {
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

              handle_arguments "${@}"
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

              if [[ "${BUMP_INTERVAL:-}" == "" ]]; then
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

                echo "${BATS_VERSION}"
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

                exit 0
          
      39.

      40.

              local NEW_BATS_VERSION

              NEW_BATS_VERSION=$(semver bump "${BUMP_INTERVAL}" "${BATS_VERSION}")

              declare -r NEW_BATS_VERSION
          
      44.

      45.
