            print_test_case() {
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            
            

            

              if [[ "$test_result_state" == ok && -z "$_system_out_log" && -z "$_buffer_log" ]]; then
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
            

            

                # pass and no output can be shortened
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
            

            

                printf "    <testcase classname=\"%s\" name=\"%s\" time=\"%s\" />\n" "$(xml_escape "${class}")" "$(xml_escape "${name}")" "$(milliseconds_to_seconds "${test_exec_time}")"
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            
            

            

              else
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            
            

            

                printf "    <testcase classname=\"%s\" name=\"%s\" time=\"%s\">\n" "$(xml_escape "${class}")" "$(xml_escape "${name}")" "$(milliseconds_to_seconds "${test_exec_time}")"
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            
            

            

                if [[ -n "$_system_out_log" ]]; then
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            
            

            

                  printf "        <system-out>%s</system-out>\n" "$(xml_escape "${_system_out_log}")"
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            
            

            

                fi
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
            

            

                if [[ -n "$_buffer_log" || "$test_result_state" == not_ok ]]; then
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            
            

            

                  printf "        <failure type=\"failure\">%s</failure>\n" "$(xml_escape "${_buffer_log}")"
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            
            

            

                fi
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
            

            

                if [[ "$test_result_state" == skipped ]]; then
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            
            

            

                  printf "        <skipped>%s</skipped>\n" "$(xml_escape "$test_skip_message")"
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
            

            

                fi
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
            

            

                printf "    </testcase>\n"
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            
            

            

              fi
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            
            

            

            
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            
            

            

            xml_escape() {
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
            

            

              output=${1//&/\&amp;}
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            
            

            

              output=${output//</\&lt;}
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
            

            

              output=${output//>/\&gt;}
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            
            

            

              output=${output//'"'/\&quot;}
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            
            

            

              output=${output//\'/\&#39;}
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            
            

            

              local CONTROL_CHAR=$'\033'
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            
            

            

              output=${output//$CONTROL_CHAR/\&#27;}
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            
            

            

              printf "%s" "$output"
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            
            

            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            
            

            

            suite_buffer() {
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            
            

            

              local output
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            
            

            

              output="$(
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            
            

            

                "$@"
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            
            

            

                printf "x"
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            
            

            

              )" # use x marker to avoid losing trailing newlines
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            
            

            

              _suite_buffer="${_suite_buffer}${output%x}"
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            
            

            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            
            

            

            suite_flush() {
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
            

            

              echo -n "${_suite_buffer}"
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
            

            

              _suite_buffer=""
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            
            

            

            
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            
            

            

            buffer() {
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            
            

            

              local output
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            
            

            

              output="$(
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            
            

            

                "$@"
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            
            

            

                printf "x"
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            
            

            

              )" # use x marker to avoid losing trailing newlines
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            
            

            

              _buffer="${_buffer}${output%x}"
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
            

            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
            

            

            flush() {
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            
            

            

              echo -n "${_buffer}"
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            
            

            

              _buffer=""
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
            

            

            
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
            

            

            log() {
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            
            

            

              if [[ -n "$_buffer_log" ]]; then
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
            

            

                _buffer_log="${_buffer_log}
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            
            

            

            $1"
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            
            

            

              else
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
            

            

                _buffer_log="$1"
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
            

            

              fi
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
            

            

            
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
            

            

            flush_log() {
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            
            

            

              if [[ -n "$test_result_state" ]]; then
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
            

            

                buffer print_test_case
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
            

            

              fi
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
            

            

              _buffer_log=""
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
            

            

              _system_out_log=""
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
            

            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
            

            

            log_system_out() {
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
            

            

              if [[ -n "$_system_out_log" ]]; then
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
            

            

                _system_out_log="${_system_out_log}
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
            

            

            $1"
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
            

            

              else
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
            

            

                _system_out_log="$1"
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
            

            

              fi
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
            

            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
            

            

            finish_file() {
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
            

            

              if [[ "${class-JUNIT_FORMATTER_NO_FILE_ENCOUNTERED}" != JUNIT_FORMATTER_NO_FILE_ENCOUNTERED ]]; then
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
            

            

                file_header
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
            

            

                printf "%s\n" "${_buffer}"
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
            

            

                file_footer
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
            

            

              fi
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
            

            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
            

            

            finish_suite() {
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
            

            

              flush_log
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
            

            

              suite_header
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
            

            

              suite_flush
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
            

            

              finish_file # must come after suite flush to not print the last file before the others
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
            

            

              suite_footer
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
            

            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
            

            

            bats_tap_stream_plan() { #  <number of tests>
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
            

            

              :
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
            

            

            
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
            

            

            init_suite
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
            

            

            trap finish_suite EXIT
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

            trap '' INT
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
            

            

            
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
            

            

            bats_tap_stream_begin() { # <test index> <test name>
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
            

            

              flush_log
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
            

            

              # set after flushing to avoid overriding name of test
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
            

            

              name="$2"
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
            

            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
            

            

            bats_tap_stream_ok() { # <test index> <test name>
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            
            

            

              test_exec_time=${BATS_FORMATTER_TEST_DURATION:-0}
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
            

            

              ((file_count += 1))
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            
            

            

              test_result_state='ok'
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
            

            

              file_exec_time="$((file_exec_time + test_exec_time))"
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            
            

            

              suite_test_exec_time=$((suite_test_exec_time + test_exec_time))
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
            

            

            
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
            

            

            bats_tap_stream_skipped() { # <test index> <test name> <skip reason>
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
            

            

              test_exec_time=${BATS_FORMATTER_TEST_DURATION:-0}
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
            

            

              ((file_count += 1))
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
            

            

              ((file_skipped += 1))
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            
            

            

              test_result_state='skipped'
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            
            

            

              test_exec_time=0
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
            

            

              test_skip_message="$3"
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            
            

            

            
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            
            

            

            bats_tap_stream_not_ok() { # <test index> <test name>
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            
            

            

              test_exec_time=${BATS_FORMATTER_TEST_DURATION:-0}
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            
            

            

              ((file_count += 1))
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            
            

            

              ((file_failures += 1))
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            
            

            

              test_result_state=not_ok
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            
            

            

              file_exec_time="$((file_exec_time + test_exec_time))"
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            
            

            

              suite_test_exec_time=$((suite_test_exec_time + test_exec_time))
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            
            

            

            
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            
            

            

            bats_tap_stream_comment() { # <comment text without leading '# '> <scope>
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            
            

            

              local comment="$1" scope="$2"
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            
            

            

              case "$scope" in
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            
            

            

              begin)
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            
            

            

                # everything that happens between begin and [not] ok is FD3 output from the test
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            
            

            

                log_system_out "$comment"
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            
            

            

                ;;
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            
            

            

              ok)
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            
            

            

                # non failed tests can produce FD3 output
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            
            

            

                log_system_out "$comment"
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            
            

            

                ;;
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            
            

            

              *)
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            
            

            

                # everything else is considered error output
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            
            

            

                log "$1"
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            
            

            

                ;;
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            
            

            

              esac
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            
            

            

            
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            
            

            

            bats_tap_stream_suite() { # <file name>
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            
            

            

              flush_log
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            
            

            

              suite_buffer finish_file
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            
            

            

              init_file
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            
            

            

              class="${1/$BASE_PATH/}"
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            
            

            

            
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            
            

            

            bats_tap_stream_unknown() { # <full line>
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            
            

            

              :
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            
            

            

            
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            
            

            

            bats_parse_internal_extended_tap
          
      251.

    test/bats/libexec/bats-core/bats-format-pretty

    0.0% lines covered

    178 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 178 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            
            

            

            #!/usr/bin/env bash
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            
            

            

            set -e
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
            

            

            # shellcheck source=lib/bats-core/formatter.bash
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
            

            

            source "$BATS_ROOT/lib/bats-core/formatter.bash"
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
            

            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
            

            

            BASE_PATH=.
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
            

            

            BATS_ENABLE_TIMING=
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
            

            

            while [[ "$#" -ne 0 ]]; do
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
            

            

              case "$1" in
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
            

            

              -T)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

                BATS_ENABLE_TIMING="-T"
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

                ;;
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

              --base-path)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
            

            

                shift
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

                normalize_base_path BASE_PATH "$1"
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
            

            

                ;;
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
            

            

              esac
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

              shift
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
            

            

            done
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

            update_count_column_width() {
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

              count_column_width=$((${#count} * 2 + 2))
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

              if [[ -n "$BATS_ENABLE_TIMING" ]]; then
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
            

            

                # additional space for ' in %s sec'
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
            

            

                count_column_width=$((count_column_width + ${#SECONDS} + 8))
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

              fi
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
            

            

              # also update dependent value
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
            

            

              update_count_column_left
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
            

            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

            update_screen_width() {
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

              screen_width="$(tput cols)"
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

              # also update dependent value
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

              update_count_column_left
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
            

            

            update_count_column_left() {
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

              count_column_left=$((screen_width - count_column_width))
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
            

            

            # avoid unset variables
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
            

            

            count=0
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
            

            

            screen_width=80
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            
            

            

            update_count_column_width
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
            

            

            update_screen_width
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            
            

            

            test_result=
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
            

            

            trap update_screen_width WINCH
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
            

            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
            

            

            begin() {
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
            

            

              test_result= # reset to avoid carrying over result state from previous test
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
            

            

              line_backoff_count=0
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
            

            

              go_to_column 0
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
            

            

              update_count_column_width
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
            

            

              buffer_with_truncation $((count_column_left - 1)) '   %s' "$name"
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            
            

            

              clear_to_end_of_line
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            
            

            

              go_to_column $count_column_left
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
            

            

              if [[ -n "$BATS_ENABLE_TIMING" ]]; then
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            
            

            

                buffer "%${#count}s/${count} in %s sec" "$index" "$SECONDS"
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            
            

            

              else
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            
            

            

                buffer "%${#count}s/${count}" "$index"
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            
            

            

              fi
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            
            

            

              go_to_column 1
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            
            

            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            
            

            

            finish_test() {
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            
            

            

              move_up $line_backoff_count
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            
            

            

              go_to_column 0
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            
            

            

              buffer "$@"
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
            

            

              if [[ -n "${TIMEOUT-}" ]]; then
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
            

            

                set_color 2
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            
            

            

                if [[ -n "$BATS_ENABLE_TIMING" ]]; then
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            
            

            

                  buffer ' [%s (timeout: %s)]' "$TIMING" "$TIMEOUT"
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            
            

            

                else
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            
            

            

                  buffer ' [timeout: %s]' "$TIMEOUT"
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            
            

            

                fi
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            
            

            

              else
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            
            

            

                if [[ -n "$BATS_ENABLE_TIMING" ]]; then
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
            

            

                  set_color 2
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            
            

            

                  buffer ' [%s]' "$TIMING"
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
            

            

                fi
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
            

            

              fi
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            
            

            

              advance
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            
            

            

              move_down $((line_backoff_count - 1))
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            
            

            

            
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            
            

            

            pass() {
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
            

            

              local TIMING="${1:-}"
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            
            

            

              finish_test '  %s' "$name"
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            
            

            

              test_result=pass
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            
            

            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
            

            

            skip() {
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
            

            

              local reason="$1" TIMING="${2:-}"
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            
            

            

              if [[ -n "$reason" ]]; then
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            
            

            

                reason=": $reason"
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            
            

            

              fi
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            
            

            

              finish_test ' - %s (skipped%s)' "$name" "$reason"
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
            

            

              test_result=skip
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
            

            

            
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            
            

            

            fail() {
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            
            

            

              local TIMING="${1:-}"
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            
            

            

              set_color 1 bold
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            
            

            

              finish_test '  %s' "$name"
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            
            

            

              test_result=fail
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            
            

            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            
            

            

            timeout() {
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            
            

            

              local TIMING="${1:-}"
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            
            

            

              set_color 3 bold
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            
            

            

              TIMEOUT="${2:-}" finish_test '  %s' "$name"
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            
            

            

              test_result=timeout
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            
            

            

            
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
            

            

            log() {
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            
            

            

              case ${test_result} in
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            
            

            

              pass)
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
            

            

                clear_color
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
            

            

                ;;
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            
            

            

              fail)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            
            

            

                set_color 1
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            
            

            

                ;;
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            
            

            

              timeout)
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            
            

            

                set_color 3
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            
            

            

                ;;
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            
            

            

              esac
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            
            

            

              buffer '   %s\n' "$1"
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            
            

            

              clear_color
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
            

            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
            

            

            summary() {
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            
            

            

              if [ "$failures" -eq 0 ]; then
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            
            

            

                set_color 2 bold
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            
            

            

              else
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
            

            

                set_color 1 bold
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
            

            

              fi
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            
            

            

            
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
            

            

              buffer '\n%d test' "$count"
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            
            

            

              if [[ "$count" -ne 1 ]]; then
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            
            

            

                buffer 's'
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
            

            

              fi
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
            

            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
            

            

              buffer ', %d failure' "$failures"
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
            

            

              if [[ "$failures" -ne 1 ]]; then
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
            

            

                buffer 's'
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            
            

            

              fi
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
            

            

            
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
            

            

              if [[ "$skipped" -gt 0 ]]; then
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
            

            

                buffer ', %d skipped' "$skipped"
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
            

            

              fi
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
            

            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
            

            

              if ((timed_out > 0)); then
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
            

            

                buffer ', %d timed out' "$timed_out"
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
            

            

              fi
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
            

            

            
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
            

            

              not_run=$((count - passed - failures - skipped - timed_out))
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
            

            

              if [[ "$not_run" -gt 0 ]]; then
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
            

            

                buffer ', %d not run' "$not_run"
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
            

            

              fi
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
            

            

            
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
            

            

              if [[ -n "$BATS_ENABLE_TIMING" ]]; then
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
            

            

                buffer " in $SECONDS seconds"
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
            

            

              fi
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
            

            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
            

            

              buffer '\n'
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
            

            

              clear_color
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
            

            

            
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
            

            

            buffer_with_truncation() {
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
            

            

              local width="$1"
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
            

            

              shift
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
            

            

              local string
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
            

            

            
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
            

            

              # shellcheck disable=SC2059
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
            

            

              printf -v 'string' -- "$@"
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
            

            

            
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
            

            

              if [[ "${#string}" -gt "$width" ]]; then
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
            

            

                buffer '%s...' "${string:0:$((width - 4))}"
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
            

            

              else
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
            

            

                buffer '%s' "$string"
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
            

            

              fi
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
            

            

            
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

            move_up() {
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
            

            

              if [[ $1 -gt 0 ]]; then # avoid moving if we got 0
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
            

            

                buffer '\x1B[%dA' "$1"
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
            

            

              fi
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
            

            

            
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
            

            

            move_down() {
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
            

            

              if [[ $1 -gt 0 ]]; then # avoid moving if we got 0
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
            

            

                buffer '\x1B[%dB' "$1"
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            
            

            

              fi
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            
            

            

            
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
            

            

            go_to_column() {
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            
            

            

              local column="$1"
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
            

            

              buffer '\x1B[%dG' $((column + 1))
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
            

            

            
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
            

            

            clear_to_end_of_line() {
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
            

            

              buffer '\x1B[K'
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            
            

            

            
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            
            

            

            advance() {
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
            

            

              clear_to_end_of_line
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            
            

            

              buffer '\n'
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            
            

            

              clear_color
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            
            

            

            
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            
            

            

            set_color() {
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            
            

            

              local color="$1"
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            
            

            

              local weight=22
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            
            

            

            
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            
            

            

              if [[ "${2:-}" == 'bold' ]]; then
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            
            

            

                weight=1
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            
            

            

              fi
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            
            

            

              buffer '\x1B[%d;%dm' "$((30 + color))" "$weight"
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            
            

            

            
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            
            

            

            clear_color() {
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            
            

            

              buffer '\x1B[0m'
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            
            

            

            
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            
            

            

            _buffer=
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            
            

            

            
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            
            

            

            buffer() {
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            
            

            

              local content
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            
            

            

              # shellcheck disable=SC2059
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            
            

            

              printf -v content -- "$@"
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            
            

            

              _buffer+="$content"
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            
            

            

            
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            
            

            

            prefix_buffer_with() {
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            
            

            

              local old_buffer="$_buffer"
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            
            

            

              _buffer=''
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            
            

            

              "$@"
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            
            

            

              _buffer="$_buffer$old_buffer"
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            
            

            

            
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            
            

            

            flush() {
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            
            

            

              printf '%s' "$_buffer"
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            
            

            

              _buffer=
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            
            

            

            
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            
            

            

            finish() {
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            
            

            

              flush
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            
            

            

              printf '\n'
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            
            

            

            
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            
            

            

            trap finish EXIT
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            
            

            

            trap '' INT
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            
            

            

            
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            
            

            

            bats_tap_stream_plan() {
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            
            

            

              count="$1"
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            
            

            

              index=0
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            
            

            

              passed=0
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            
            

            

              failures=0

    262. 
            
            

            

              skipped=0
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            
            

            

              timed_out=0
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            
            

            

              name=
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            
            

            

              update_count_column_width

            bats_tap_stream_begin() {
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            
            

            

              index="$1"

              name="$2"
          
      271.

            bats_tap_stream_ok() {
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            
            

            

              index="$1"
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            
            

            

              name="$2"
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            
            

            

              ((++passed))
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            
            

            

            
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            
            

            

              pass "${BATS_FORMATTER_TEST_DURATION:-}"
          
      281.

            }

            bats_tap_stream_skipped() {
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            
            

            

              index="$1"
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            
            

            

              name="$2"
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            
            

            

              ((++skipped))
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            
            

            

              skip "$3" "${BATS_FORMATTER_TEST_DURATION:-}"
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            
            

            

            
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            
            

            

            bats_tap_stream_not_ok() {
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            
            

            

              index="$1"
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            
            

            

              name="$2"
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            
            

            

            
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            
            

            

              if [[ ${BATS_FORMATTER_TEST_TIMEOUT-x} != x ]]; then
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            
            

            

                timeout "${BATS_FORMATTER_TEST_DURATION:-}" "${BATS_FORMATTER_TEST_TIMEOUT}s"
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            
            

            

                ((++timed_out))
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            
            

            

              else
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            
            

            

                fail "${BATS_FORMATTER_TEST_DURATION:-}"
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            
            

            

                ((++failures))
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            
            

            

              fi
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            
            

            

            
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            
            

            

            
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            
            

            

            bats_tap_stream_comment() { # <comment> <scope>
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            
            

            

              local scope=$2
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            
            

            

              # count the lines we printed after the begin text,
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            
            

            

              if [[ $line_backoff_count -eq 0 && $scope == begin ]]; then
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            
            

            

                # if this is the first line after begin, go down one line
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            
            

            

                buffer "\n"
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            
            

            

                ((++line_backoff_count)) # prefix-increment to avoid "error" due to returning 0
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            
            

            

              fi
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            
            

            

            
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            
            

            

              ((++line_backoff_count))
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            
            

            

              ((line_backoff_count += ${#1} / screen_width)) # account for linebreaks due to length
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            
            

            

              log "$1"
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            
            

            

            
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            
            

            

            bats_tap_stream_suite() {
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            
            

            

              #test_file="$1"
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            
            

            

              line_backoff_count=0
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            
            

            

              index=
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            
            

            

              # indicate filename for failures
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            
            

            

              local file_name="${1#"$BASE_PATH"}"
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            
            

            

              name="File $file_name"
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            
            

            

              set_color 4 bold
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            
            

            

              buffer "%s\n" "$file_name"
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            
            

            

              clear_color
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            
            

            

            
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            
            

            

            line_backoff_count=0
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            
            

            

            bats_tap_stream_unknown() { # <full line> <scope>
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            
            

            

              local scope=$2
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            
            

            

              # count the lines we printed after the begin text, (or after suite, in case of syntax errors)
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            
            

            

              if [[ $line_backoff_count -eq 0 && ($scope == begin || $scope == suite) ]]; then
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            
            

            

                # if this is the first line after begin, go down one line
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            
            

            

                buffer "\n"
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            
            

            

                ((++line_backoff_count)) # prefix-increment to avoid "error" due to returning 0
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            
            

            

              fi
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            
            

            

            
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            
            

            

              ((++line_backoff_count))
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            
            

            

              ((line_backoff_count += ${#1} / screen_width)) # account for linebreaks due to length
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            
            

            

              buffer "%s\n" "$1"
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            
            

            

              flush
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            
            

            

            }
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            
            

            

            
          
      346. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    346. 
            
            

            

            bats_parse_internal_extended_tap

            bats_tap_stream_skipped() { # <test index> <test name> <reason>

    36. 
            
            

            

              if [[ $# -eq 3 ]]; then
          
      37.

                printf "ok %d %s # skip %s\n" "$1" "$2" "$3"
